Question_1

Class SlotMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • Question_1.SlotMachine

  • public class SlotMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    A Slot Machine program that simulates a real slot machine. The user specifies his bets and can cash out the token inside the machine.

    CONTROLS:
    P - PULLLEVER
    T - TOPUP
    N - NEW SLOT MACHINE
    H - HOUSE CREDIT
    Q - LEAVE

      Constructor to initialize a new Slot Machine.

      Cashes out the user's remaining token credit.

      Used to get the total house credit, and save it to be retrieved if the user changes slot machines.

      Returns an integer of the user's token credit.

    • Method Detail

      • topupTokens

        public void topupTokens(int tokens)
        Tops up tokens to the current token credit of the user.
        Parameters:
        tokens - Indicates how much tokens should be topped up.

      • cashoutTokens

        public int cashoutTokens()
        Cashes out the user's remaining token credit.
        Returns:
        the current token credit.

      • pullLever

        public void pullLever()
        A method that simulates pulling a lever of a slot machine. The method creates an array of 3 random generated numbers.

        The user wins depending on matching one of the four possible outcomes:
        {0,0,0} - Super Jackpot (500x Multiplier).
        {X,X,X} - Jackpot (50x Multiplier).
        {X,X,Z} - Free Spin.
        {X,Y,Z} - Bad Luck, Try Again.

      • pullLever

        public void pullLever(int tokenInput)
        Overloads the default method if a user inputs a specified bet.
        Parameters:
        tokenInput - Amount of bet tokens the user specifies.
        See Also:
        pullLever()

      • getTokenBalance

        public int getTokenBalance()
        Returns an integer of the user's token credit.
        Returns:
        Returns the amount of token credit

      • getHouseCredit

        public int getHouseCredit()
        Used to get the total house credit, and save it to be retrieved if the user changes slot machines.
        Returns:
        Returns it back after adding the slot machine's house credit.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
